column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm Â sure it's all been said here
column2: but I do wanna shout out to the young guy hanging out by the seats
column3: making sure everyone was taken care of and tables were cleaned properly. I'm sure it's a bottom-of-the-totem-pole position. I wouldn't say he was happy. But he did a good job
